title: Skeletons aren't scary
creator_credit: Bosisto Productions, South Australian Film Corporation and John Dick
brief_description: Using muppets and animated sequences, this film deals with the death of a children’s cat and the feelings and emotions that are associated with death and dying.
creator_credit_for_label: Bosisto Productions, South Australian Film Corporation and John Dick
